name: Chill II
description: Chill is a puzzle game with relaxing music. Find a way out of a Maze with 5 levels of difficulty. Enjoy minimalist puzzle game while listening to calm music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 32-bit Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 2 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
